name: Labeled Field
description: The canonical form unit: Label stacked above Input with optional helper text below. Every form is composed of this atomic pattern repeated.
notes: gap-1.5 between label and input is the standard spacing. Helper text uses text-foreground-400 at text-xs. Error state replaces helper text with an error message.

variations.name: With Hint
variations.description: Gray helper text below the input providing format or context guidance.

variations.name: With Error
variations.description: Error message below the input with input in invalid state.
